ygData.subject: Gemcutter
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok folks lets get back to the topics at hand:) Gemcutter proposed uses are the following: Used only in the sk quest to obtain a facitaed hycanthe ( see
ygData.messageBody:
Ok folks lets get back to the topics at hand:) Gemcutter proposed
uses are the following: Used only in the sk quest to obtain a
facitaed hycanthe ( see fulcrums ), that it can be used to seperate
jewlery, that it can be used to modify already made jewlery ( which
personally i don't think would work but hey), that is can be used in
the construction of magical armor ( because the blacksmith box got 2
extra slots about the same time the gemcutter was introduced) or that
it is used with pattern's not used in anything else to make cut
stones. If you have any input right in I have a gemcutter and have
more diamond dust I just want to get some feedback which seems more
likely to everyone else.

Grundup TinkertotPuddlejumper
39th Practioner of Death and 105 in tinkering
